swfscDAS 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

DAS sightings

Source: R/das_sight.R
das_sight.Rd

Extract sightings and associated information from processed DAS data

das_sight(x, mixed.multi)

# S3 method for data.frame
das_sight(x, mixed.multi)

# S3 method for das_df
das_sight(x, mixed.multi)

Arguments

x

das_df object; output from das_process
mixed.multi

logical; indicates if mixed-species sightings should be output in multiple rows

Value

Data frame with ... Associated information (observer, species, etc.) is extracted from Data# columns as specified in Details. Other columns from x will be included in the output

Details

This function requires that the following assumptions be true:

  • All (and only) "S", "K", and "M" events are immediately followed by an "A" event

  • TODO

Examples

y <- system.file("das_sample.das", package = "swfscDAS")
y.proc <- das_process(y)

das_sight(y.proc)
